name: Outgun online
description:
OUTGUN online is a online multiplayer pvp arena shooter. Where you try to take down your enemy while adapting to multiple game rules and gun pickups. Each rule challenging your mastery of the controls in the outrun themed maps.

This game was submitted as part of the GMTK 2020 gamejam.

credits:

Programming - BountyWolf

Music/Art - soVes
